Description.Text:
Property Location
Centrally located in Manchester, Staycity Serviced Apartments - Laystall St is minutes from Affleck's Palace and Piccadilly Gardens. This 4-star apartment is within close proximity of Arndale Centre and Phones 4u Arena.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 84 guestrooms, featuring kitchens with full-sized refrigerators/freezers and stovetops. Your room comes with a pillowtop bed, and all rooms are furnished with sofa beds. Rooms have private balconies. Flat-screen televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a computer station, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is 11 AM

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Greater Manchester Police Museum - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Affleck's Palace - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Piccadilly Gardens - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Chinese Arts Centre - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Arndale Centre - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Imperial Chinese Archway - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Portico Library and Gallery - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Manchester Art Gallery - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Printworks - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Manchester Conference Centre - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
National Football Museum - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Urbis - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Manchester City Hall - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
St. Peter's Square - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Chetham's Library - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi

The preferred airport for Staycity Serviced Apartments - Laystall St is Manchester (MAN) - 13.5 km / 8.4 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
